qu:Page.name: Estimated Expenditure of Time
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The estimated expenditure of time you will need to fill in this questionnaire is 8-10 minutes.

qu:Page.name: System Quality (SQ)
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The upcoming section presents a set of question items on technical properties of ${SERVICE.NAME}.

qu:Page.name: Convenience of Access
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How convenient is the access to service ${SERVICE.NAME}?

qu:Page.name: Intuitiveness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How intuitive is service usage?

qu:Page.name: Responsiveness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: A crucial prerequisite for services is to be highly responsive. Are requests responded quickly?

qu:Page.name: Reliability
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Adding, removal, editing and the retrieval of managed information are central basic service features. How often did these operations fail for you?

qu:Page.name: Usefulness of Features - Community
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How useful are provided features with special regard to your community ${COMMUNITY}?

qu:Page.name: Usefulness of Features - General
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Are features provided by ${SERVICE.NAME} useful in general?

qu:Page.name: Completeness of Features
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Is any crucial feature missing?

qu:Page.name: Integration - Genericity
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Are provided service features widely applicable or rather constrained to specific usage scenarios?

qu:Page.name: Innovativeness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How innovative are currently supported service features?

qu:Page.name: Mobile Context Awareness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: To what degree is information about your current surrounding (e.g. your current GPS position) integrated into service features?

qu:Page.name: Security - General
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How secure is the usage of ${SERVICE.NAME}?

qu:Page.name: Security - Personal Privacy
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: To what degree could you control access to your personal information managed by the service?

qu:Page.name: Information Quality (IQ)
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The upcoming section will present a set of question items on the quality of the information managed and presented by ${SERVICE.NAME}.

qu:Page.name: Usefulness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How useful is information presented by ${SERVICE.NAME}?

qu:Page.name: Understandability
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Is the presented information understandable?

qu:Page.name: Conciseness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Is a minimal amount of concise information presented or was the information overloaded with irrelevant details?

qu:Page.name: Completeness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Is the information presented by ${SERVICE.NAME} complete?

qu:Page.name: Timeliness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Is presented information rather outdated or up-to-date?

qu:Page.name: Uniqueness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Have you seen similar forms of the presented information before?

qu:Page.name: Appropriateness of Format
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Is the information well structured and reflected by an appropriate presentation format?

qu:Page.name: User Satisfaction (US)
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The upcoming section will present a set of question items on your personal satisfaction with ${SERVICE.NAME}.

qu:Page.name: System Satisfaction
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Are you satisfied with the technical realization of ${SERVICE.NAME}?

qu:Page.name: Information Satisfaction
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Are you satisfied with the information presented to you?

qu:Page.name: Perceived Enjoyment
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How do you rate your personal level of enjoyment when using ${SERVICE.NAME}?

qu:Page.name: Individual Impact (II)
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The upcoming section presents a set of question items on how and to what degree ${SERVICE.NAME} impacted you personally.

qu:Page.name: Improved Learning
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: To what degree does service usage improve your personal learning process?

qu:Page.name: Improved Personal Productivity
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does service usage improve your personal productivity?

qu:Page.name: Contribution to Personal Goal Achievement
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does service usage contribute to achieving your personal goals?

qu:Page.name: Individual Influence within Community
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does usage of ${SERVICE.NAME} influence your position among members of ${COMMUNITY}?

qu:Page.name: Community Impact (CI)
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: The upcoming section presents a set of question items on how and to what degree ${SERVICE.NAME} impacts your community ${COMMUNITY}.

qu:Page.name: Community Evolution - Attraction of Members
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does ${SERVICE.NAME} attract new members to your community ${COMMUNITY}?

qu:Page.name: Community Evolution - Community Building
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does service usage motivate or support the evolution of new communities/subcommunities?

qu:Page.name: Improved Community Productivity
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does ${SERVICE.NAME} improve the productivity of your community ${COMMUNITY}?

qu:Page.name: Contribution to Community Goal Achievement
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does the service contribute to achieving goals defined by your community ${COMMUNITY}?

qu:Page.name: Motivation for Collaboration
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does ${SERVICE.NAME} motivate collaboration between you and members of ${COMMUNITY}?

qu:Page.name: Encouragement of Innovation
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Does the service encourage development of new innovative services/applications in your community?

qu:Page.name: Community Awareness
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Are you aware of activities of other ${COMMUNITY} members using the service?

qu:Page.name: Overall Service Success
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: How successful do you expect ${SERVICE.NAME} to be in future? Please note that an answer to this question is mandatory!

qu:Page.name: Final Comments
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Finally we would like to ask you to provide any additional comments, e.g. possible improvements for ${SERVICE.NAME}, remarks about this questionnaire, etc.
